title: Duplicated imports in configure.go
body:
## Problem statement

`swagger generate server` generates code that doesn't compile

## Swagger specification
```yaml
host: localhost:45555
info:
  title: Marketplace Parser
  version: 0.1.0
produces:
  - application/json
consumes:
  - application/json
schemes:
  - http
swagger: "2.0"
paths:

  /search:
    post:
      tags:
        - watchedgames
      operationId: searchGame
      parameters:
        - in: body
          name: game
          description: Name of the game to search for.
          schema:
            type: object
            required:
              - gameName
            properties:
              gameName:
                type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: list of products that matches the searched game
          schema:
            $ref: "#/definitions/gameSearchResult"
        500:
          description: generic error response
          schema:
            $ref: "#/definitions/error"

definitions:
  gameSearchResult:
    type: object
    description: A collection of games that have been found through
    properties:
      data:
        type: array
        items:
          $ref: "#/definitions/gameSearchResultItem"

  gameSearchResultItem:
    type: object
    description: A game that have been found
    properties:
      name:
        description: Name of the product
        type: string
      price:
        description: Price of the product
        type: number
        format: double
      provider:
        description: Provider on which this product was found
        type: string
      link:
        type: string
        description: Url to this product

  error:
    type: object
    required:
      - message
    properties:
      code:
        type: integer
        format: int64
      message:
        type: string
```

## Steps to reproduce
`swagger.exe generate server -f swagger.yml /A vg-api /m restapimodels`
configure_vg.go contains the following imports :

```
import (
  "crypto/tls"
  "net/http"
  "log"

  errors "github.com/go-openapi/errors"
  runtime "github.com/go-openapi/runtime"
  middleware "github.com/go-openapi/runtime/middleware"
  security "github.com/go-openapi/runtime/security"
  "golang.org/x/net/context"

  "github.com/mrluje/marketplace-parser/restapi/operations/watchedgames"
  "github.com/mrluje/marketplace-parser/restapi/operations/watchedgames"  <----- duplicated
  "github.com\\mrluje\\marketplace-parser\\restapi"       <------ backslashes
  "github.com/mrluje/marketplace-parser/restapi/operations"
  
  restapimodels "github.com/mrluje/marketplace-parser/restapimodels"
  
)
```

## Environment
swagger version: master branch commit: df5b513aede5f5f7f39498bfcd4ea50a5194bb06 (found while testing #1624)

go version: go1.10.3 windows/amd64
OS:   Windows 10 1803
